SELECT count(1) FROM t_property_staff stf LEFT JOIN t_staff_archive stfarc ON stf.id = stfarc.staff_id LEFT JOIN basic.t_customer cst ON stfarc.cust_global_id = cst.global_id LEFT JOIN t_property_department dept on stf.department_id = dept.id LEFT JOIN t_sys_dict dict on stf.position = dict.`value` and dict.group_code = 'POSITION'
LEFT JOIN t_manage_project mp on stf.id = mp.staff_id and mp.project_id = #{extra.projectId}

SELECT stf.id, stf.account, stf.name, stf.number, stf.entry_time, stf.work_status, stf.department_id, stf.position, stf.create_time, stf.creator_id, stf.oem_code FROM t_sys_role_user sru LEFT JOIN t_property_staff stf ON sru.user_id = stf.id WHERE sru.role_id = #{extra.roleId}
